ComicInfo.Title: All This and Penny, Too...; Human Diastrophism, Part Five
ComicInfo.Summary:
All This and Penny, Too...: Broke and homeless, Tex and Hopey go to Costigan Manor East to hang out with the superhero cosplaying Penny Century. Also, a flashback to the Locas's teen years showing how they met Penny and how she got her name.
Human Diastrophism, Part Five: Carmen has Tonantzin tied up while she and her friends feast in an attempt to cure her. Humberto and Tomaso are brought in for questioning. At the police lineup, however, someone else takes responsibility for the killings. Luba drops Guadalupe off with Heraclio and Casimira and Doralis with Khamo, letting them know they're their respective fathers. Maricela confesses to Diana she was the one who read Mejia's letters to Tonantzin. Chelo accidentally shoots Casimira while trying to cull some of the rampaging monkeys that are plaguing Palomar. Riri and Maricela leave Palomar for good.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-05-30 21:31:51. [CVDB95755] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-10 21:58:50. [Issue ID 212411]
